channel.title: JDM on Emily Sumner (UNDER CONSTRUCTION)
channel.description: Recent content in JDM on Emily Sumner (UNDER CONSTRUCTION)

item.title: Exploration during childhood
item.description: We show that children are more explorative than adults on bandit tasks.

item.title: Recency biases in young children
item.description: We show that toddlers and young children demonstrate a recency bias when answering questions verbally.

item.title: Tablet measures of executive function
item.description: We built child-friendly measures of executive function and risk propensity.

item.title: Virtual reality measures of risk propensity
item.description: We built a virtual reality measure risk propensity.
